sentences.en: A deep - rooted tree is leafy ; an ambitious man is vigorous.
sentences.cn: 根深 叶才茂,志壮干劲高.

sentences.en: a vigorous campaign against tax fraud
sentences.cn: 坚决打击骗税的运动

sentences.en: a vigorous debate
sentences.cn: 一场激烈的辩论

sentences.en: a vigorous young man
sentences.cn: 精力充沛的年轻男子

sentences.en: Environmentalists have begun a vigorous campaign to oppose nuclear dumping in the area.
sentences.cn: 环保人士已经发动了一场积极的运动，反对在该地区倾倒核废物。

sentences.en: He collapsed following a vigorous exercise session at his home.
sentences.cn: 在家剧烈运动了一阵后他突然昏倒了。

sentences.en: He is none the less vigorous for his years.
sentences.cn: 他虽年老而依然健壮.

sentences.en: His prose is vigorous and dense, occasionally to the point of obscurity.
sentences.cn: 他的散文文笔有力、内容庞杂，有时几近晦涩。

sentences.en: More vigorous action is needed to force the federal army to disengage.
sentences.cn: 需要更强有力的行动来迫使联邦军队撤军。

sentences.en: She made a vigorous speech in defence of her boyfriend.
sentences.cn: 她为她的男朋友做了有力的辩护.

sentences.en: She was a very vigorous sort of person.
sentences.cn: 她是那种精力非常充沛的人。

sentences.en: Sir Robert was a strong and vigorous politician.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特爵士是位坚定而又活跃的政治家。

sentences.en: That 70 - year - old man walked into the park with vigorous strides.
sentences.cn: 那位 七旬 老人健步走进公园.

sentences.en: The economy needs vigorous resuscitation.
sentences.cn: 经济需要大力复苏。

sentences.en: The measures provoked vigorous opposition in right-wing circles.
sentences.cn: 这些举措激起了右翼群体的强烈反对。

sentences.en: The old man is still vigorous and lively.
sentences.cn: 那老人依然精力充沛.

sentences.en: This plant is a vigorous grower.
sentences.cn: 这种植物生长起来茂盛茁壮。

sentences.en: Though nearly 50, he is exceptionally vigorous in work.
sentences.cn: 别看他快50岁了, 工作却是雷厉风行.

sentences.en: Vigorous efforts are being made to find a solution to the problem.
sentences.cn: 正积极地寻找办法解决这个问题。

sentences.en: Vigorous youth is subjected to rigorous discipline.
sentences.cn: 活泼的年轻人须受到严格的纪律约束.

sentences.en: We urge vigorous action to be taken immediately.
sentences.cn: 我们强烈要求立即采取有力措施。

sentences.en: Your dog needs at least 20 minutes of vigorous exercise every day.
sentences.cn: 你的狗每天需要进行至少20分钟的剧烈运动。

trans.tran_cn: 有力的，精力充沛的，充满活力的，朝气蓬勃的
trans.tran_en: using a lot of energy and strength or determination
